text: Remastersys is a free software/open source (GPL) script for Linux distributions. Users can: * Create a customized Live CD/DVD of Ubuntu. * Backup all the system, including user data to an installable Live CD/DVD. ==Other websites== * Remastersys forums * Wiki of Remastersys project * How to make a customized Ubuntu Live CD/DVD with remastersys Category:Live CD Category:Linux software
title: Remastersys
